subject: RE: [junit] Re: Having trouble getting new junit install to work  in mac osx panther
msgSnippet: ... That s a typo.  The export command should be in $HOME/.bashrc * -- Jim Dixon  jdd@dixons.org   tel +44 117 982 0786  mobile +44 797 373 7881
messageBody:
On Mon, 19 Jan 2004, Demyanovich, Craig - Apogent wrote:

> If you're using bash as your shell, you'll want to use 'export' instead of
> 'setenv'. Furthermore, place the export command in a file named '.bachrc'

That's a typo. The export command should be in
$HOME/.bashrc
*

--
Jim Dixon jdd@... tel +44 117 982 0786 mobile +44 797 373 7881
